name: Paternitree
description:
"Paternitree" is a compact and engaging mystery game made in Global game jam 2023. You play as a young woman on a journey to uncover the identity of her unknown father. You inherit a mysterious house and must use cryptic clues and mementos found within its walls to piece together the story of the man who once lived there.

With its focused and compelling storyline, "Paternitree" offers a thrilling and intriguing experience. Explore the house, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets as you delve deeper into the mystery. But be careful, the truth may be stranger than you could have ever imagined.

Features:

  • Compelling story centered around the protagonist's search for her father
  • Intriguing puzzles to solve within the mysterious house
  • Cryptic clues and mementos to piece together the story of the protagonist's father

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Crouch: C
  • Interact: F
  • Pause: P
  • Journal: TAB

Join the young woman on her journey to discover the truth in "Paternitree", a compact and intriguing mystery game. Download now and get ready for a thrilling and mysterious adventure!

 
Global game jam site: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/untitled-ggj23-9
Leave us a Heart <3
